name: Heli Rescue!
description:
Save the Toy Soldiers with your RC Helicopter! Attach them to your hook, and fly them back to the bucket!

Made in less than 48 hours for #LudumDare38!

Supports Mouse + Keyboard, or XBox 360/One Controller

Controls:
Move: WASD / Left Joystick
Turn/Look: Mouse / Right Joystick
Manual Release: F / B Button

Update: Reduced filesize and uploaded source project
